name: Worlds Strongest Survivor
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: &quotIt isn&#039t the strongest who survives. The one who survives is the strongest.&quotAfter being discharged from the military, Jin Seowoon did nothing but play games like a loser. One day, he was invited to the world of &quotCloyd Survival,&quot which resembled a game he enjoyed.In that world were masters of martial arts, kings from other worlds, and notorious killers...It was a gathering of monsters that surpassed human imagination.Jin Seowoon had just one objectiveâ€”to survive and become on
